attr_Product_Form: Physical form of the onion product after processing.
attr_Mesh_Size: Sieve aperture range that defines particle fineness of the powder.
attr_Processing_Method: Primary technological treatment applied to the onion before it becomes powder.
attr_Organic_Status: Whether the product is certified organic or not.
attr_Origin_Country: Country where the onion powder was produced or sourced.
attr_Packaging_Type: Typical commercial packaging format for onion powder shipments.
attr_Grade: Quality classification used by manufacturers or importers.
attr_Allergen_Status: Declaration of allergen presence in the product.
attr_FDA_Registration_Number: US FDA registration identifier associated with the product batch or facility.
attr_Irradiation_Status: Indicates whether the product has been exposed to ionizing radiation.
attr_Storage_Temperature_Celsius: Recommended or recorded storage temperature for the product during transit.
attr_Expiry_Date: Year in which the product is expected to reach the end of its shelf life.
attr_Net_Weight_Per_Package: Net weight of onion granules contained in a single package.
attr_Irradiated_Status: Indicates if the granulated onion has undergone ionizing radiation treatment.
attr_Product_Use: Typical end‑use application of the granulated onion in food manufacturing.
attr_Treatment_Type: Additional processing or post‑treatment applied to the granules.
attr_Color: Visual color of the finished onion powder.
attr_Form: Physical shape or texture of the onion product after processing.
attr_Particle_Size_Range: Typical mesh or millimeter size range of the product particles.
attr_Certification: Official food safety or organic certifications attached to the product.
attr_Shelf_Life: Typical period from manufacture to expiry under normal storage conditions.
attr_Use_Type: Intended end‑use of the onion powder in the supply chain.
attr_Net_Weight_Per_Package_Kg: Net weight of a single packaged unit expressed in kilograms.
attr_Expiration_Year_Range: Typical shelf‑life window indicated on product labeling.
attr_Physical_Form: Descriptive physical state of the product after processing.
attr_Moisture_Content: Relative moisture level of the product, influencing stability.
